src_text: The maize leaf is yellow however its colour tends to brown at the base.
tgt_text: Ekikoola kya kasooli kya kyenvu wabula langi yaakyo etera okuba eya kitaka wansi.

src_text: The maize leaves have been eaten by caterpillars.
tgt_text: Ebikoola bya kasooli biriiriddwa ebisaanyi.

src_text: Ceremonies are part of life.
tgt_text: Emikolo kitundu ku bulamu.

src_text: How was the comedy show?
tgt_text: Ekivvulu kya bakazanyiikirizi kyabadde kitya?

src_text: Cholera is a disease caused by poor sanitation.
tgt_text: Kolera bulwadde obuleetebwa bukyafu.

src_text: Early pregnancies have led to increased dropout rates of girl children.
tgt_text: Embuto ez'amangu zireetedde omuwendo gw'abaana abawala abawanduka mu ssomero okweyongera.

src_text: Bail applications will be heard by the court on Friday.
tgt_text: Okusaba kw'okweyimirirwa ku kakalu kujja kuwulirwa kkooti ku lwokutaano.

src_text: Many people never recover the expenses of the trial.
tgt_text: Abantu bangi  tebaddizibwa ssente ze bakozesa mu kulabikako mu kkooti.

src_text: Everyone was worried about the auditing process.
tgt_text: Buli omu yali mweraliikirivu ku ngeri y'okubalirira.

src_text: Factories with more than ten employees are thinking of laying off workers.
tgt_text: Amakolero agalina abakozi abasukka mu kkumi galowooza kusalako bakozi.

src_text: It is illegal for an employee to work without taking leave.
tgt_text: Kimenya mateeka omukozi okukola nga taweebwa luwummula.

src_text: Farmers should be subsidized in order to increase their profits.
tgt_text: Abalimi balina okuwewulwa kw'ebyo bye basaasaanyizaako okusobola okwongeza ku magoba gaabwe.

src_text: Animals are greatly affected by diseases.
tgt_text: Ebisolo bikosebwa nnyo endwadde.

src_text: The agricultural sector should be improved.
tgt_text: Ebyobulimi birina okutumbulwa.

src_text: We should always learn from our past mistakes.
tgt_text: Bulijjo tulina okuyigira mu nsobi zaffe ezaayita.

src_text: Oil companies need to observe proper means of waste disposal.
tgt_text: Kkampuni z'amafuta zeetaaga okulaba engeri ennungi ez'okukwatamu kasasiro.

src_text: Every after an election, candidates results are announced.
tgt_text: Buli luvannyuma lw'okulonda, ebivudde mu nkulonda kw'abeesimbyewo birangirirwa.

src_text: Here are the political aspirants from the different parts of the country.
tgt_text: Bano be beesimbyewo okuva mu bintundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo.

src_text: Candidates have received guidelines for their final examinations.
tgt_text: Abayizi abali mu bibiina eby'akamalirizo bafunye okulambikibwa mu bigezo byabwe eby'akamalirizo.

src_text: The team displayed good football skills in the tournament.
tgt_text: Ttiimu yayolesezza obukodyo bw'omupiira obulungi mu mpaka.

src_text: The pandemic would have run out of control but we managed to coerce it
tgt_text: Ekirwadde bunnansi kyanditulemye okutangira naye twasobola okukirwanysa.

src_text: They should allow children to express their thoughts and ideas.
tgt_text: Balina okukkiriza abaana okwasanguza ebirowoozo byabwe.

src_text: How long do rape case court hearings take?
tgt_text: Okuwulira emisango gy'obuliisamaanyi mu kkooti kutwala bbanga ki?

src_text: Ensuring security in the village is important.
tgt_text: Okunyweza ebyokwerinda mu kyalo kya mugaso nnyo.

src_text: The farmers' register helps chiefs to know which people engage in agriculture.
tgt_text: Olukalala okuwandiikibwa abalimi luyamba abakungu okumanya bantu ki abeenyigira mu bulimi.

src_text: An outfield player can make any number of mistakes in a game and get away with it.
tgt_text: Omuzannyi azannyira ku mabbali g'ekisaawe asobola okukola ensobi ez'enjawulo mu muzannyo n'atanenyezebwa.

src_text: Poor pay leads to crime.
tgt_text: Ensasula embi ereetera emisango.

src_text: A marathon is a long-distance race.
tgt_text: Mubunabyalo kwe kudduka emisinde emiwanvu.

src_text: Avoid contact with disease-infected people to prevent the spread of certain diseases.
tgt_text: Weewale okwetaba n'abantu abalwadde okwewala okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezimu.

src_text: The American embassy is appreciated for its contribution towards the health of Ugandans
tgt_text: Ekitebe kya America mu Uganda kisiimiddwa olw'obuyambi bwakyo eri ebyobulamu bwa Uganda.

src_text: There are some concerning issues with our law system
tgt_text: Waliwo ensonga ezimu ezeekuusa ku nkola y'amateeka gaffe.

src_text: New cities are being created in the country to improve on service delivery.
tgt_text: Ebibuga ebiggya biri mu kutondebwawo mu ggwanga okusobola okutumbula obuweereza.

src_text: People will not be allowed to get half of their savings until they retire.
tgt_text: Abantu tebajja kukkirizibwa kufuna kitundu ku ssente ze batereka okutuusa nga bawummudde ku mirimu.

src_text: The police are looking into kidnapping reports that are happening around Kampala.
tgt_text: Poliisi etunula mu alipoota z'okuwamba bantu okwetooloola Kampala

src_text: People do not know what they want.
tgt_text: Abantu tebamanyi kye baagala.

src_text: District councillors are poorly paid which affects service delivery
tgt_text: Bakansala ba disitulikiti basasulwa bubi ekikosa empeereza

src_text: Doctors need to sleep in staff houses to have immediate access to patients
tgt_text: Abasawo beetaaga basule mu nnyumba z'abakozi okusobola okukola amangu ku balwadde.

src_text: Local revenue should be tracked and monitored to fight embezzlement of funds
tgt_text: Emisolo egikungaanyizibwa kuno girina okulondoolwa okulwanisa okukozesa obubbi bw'ensimbi

src_text: God is great.
tgt_text: Katonda wa maanyi.

src_text: The high influx of refugees is likely to encourage the spread of the disease.
tgt_text: Okweyongera okw'abanoonyiboobubudamu kwandiviirako okusaasaana kw'obulwadde.

src_text: They need to guide the community about the benefits they will receive.
tgt_text: Beetaaga okuuulira abantu ku miganyulo gye bajja okufuna.

src_text: Loss of merchandise interrupts business operations.
tgt_text: Okubula eby'okugula n'okutunda kitataaganya entambula y'obusuubuzi.

src_text: Elections usually end in violence.
tgt_text: Okulonda kuteera kuggwera mu buvuyo.
